entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 7:23 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
